name: B Meta
description:
B Meta is an RPG. Probably.

The game is partway through development, but you should start playing NOW if you want the full experience. This game is designed to be played in parts, as they are released.

The first chapter (which is the game as it is now) is finished. More will come.

As of right now, I'm only releasing on Windows, as that's the only platform I've tested it on.

It takes about 30 minutes to complete the game in it's current state.

I think it's best experienced without reading the description, but if you want to ruin things, I won't stop you:

It's a game about a programmer. Or, I guess he's an artist now, too. Maybe a musician, also? Actually, that might be a spoiler. The point is, everything centers around a long-haired nerd that overthinks things a little too much. His name is B.
